channel.title: New/Updated flake8 Plugins
channel.description: Daily feed of new/updated flake8 plugins

item.title: Updated: flake8-bugbear (24.4.21)
item.description: A plugin for flake8 finding likely bugs and design problems in your program. Contains warnings that don't belong in pyflakes and pycodestyle.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-json (24.4)
item.description: JSON Formatting Reporter plugin for Flake8
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: New: flake8-one-dot (0.1.3)
item.description: A flake8 plugin to enforce object calisthenics rule "one dot per line"
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-pyi (24.4.1)
item.description: A plugin for flake8 to enable linting .pyi stub files.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: New: flake8-small-entities (0.1)
item.description: A flake8 plugin to enforce object calisthenics rule "keep entities small"
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-no-nesting (0.1.2)
item.description: A flake8 plugin to enforce object calisthenics rule "ONE level of indentation"
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)
